trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ExtendedDN"></xref> enumeration specifies the format in which to return the extended distinguished name.
This enumeration is used with the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.ExtendedDN"></xref> property.
The extended form of a distinguished name includes a string representation of the objectGUID property of an object.
For security principal objects such as users, groups, and computers, the extended form also includes a string representation of the objectSID property.

For more information about the objectGUID and objectSID properties, see the topics [Object-Guid](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_objectguid.asp) and [Object-Sid](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_objectguid.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
Indicates that the distinguished name uses the hexadecimal format.
Indicates that the distinguished name uses the distinguished name format.
Indicates that the distinguished name uses the standard string format.
